feed.title: GitHub Cuda Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Cuda in GitHub

entry.title: NVIDIA-Merlin/HierarchicalKV
entry.summary: HierarchicalKV is a part of NVIDIA Merlin and provides hierarchical key-value storage to meet RecSys requirements. The key capability of Merlin-KV is to store key-value feature-embeddings on high-bandwidth memory (HBM) of GPUs and in host memory. It also can be used as a generic key-value storage.
